title: 89/197/EEC: Commission Decision of 3 March 1989 concerning the import by Member States of fresh meat from Albania
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 3 March 1989
concerning the import by Member States of fresh meat from Albania
(89/197/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Member States may not authorize the import of fresh meat from Albania.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 March 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28.
(2) OJ No L 124, 18. 5. 1988, p. 31.
